summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Existing Building Code, amending Chapter 22.110 to the Seattle Municipal Code to adopt by reference the 2009 International Existing Building Code; amending chapters 2, 4, 6 through 10, and chapters 12, 13 and 15 and Appendix A, adopting a new Chapter 1 related to administration, permitting and enforcement; and repealing Sections 2-13 of Ordinance 122529.
